title: Decentralized Oracle Network Chainlink Leads the Crypto Space in Terms of Recent Development Activity: Santiment
description:
The decentralized oracle network Chainlink (LINK) is ahead of all other crypto projects in terms of recent development activity, according to the analytics firm Santiment. Santiment notes that Chainlink is at the top of the list with an average of 451.23 notable GitHub events over the past 30 days. The smart contract platform Cardano (ADA) […]

The post Decentralized Oracle Network Chainlink Leads the Crypto Space in Terms of Recent Development Activity: Santiment appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
